document.body:
Jaxen is an open source XPath library written in Java. This navigator treats Java beans as XML, thus enabling you to query these trees with XPath too.
The current version is 2.0.0. This release requires Java 1.5 or later. If you're still using Java 1.4, try Jaxen 1.2.0. If you're still using Java 1.3 or earlier, try Jaxen 1.1.6.
To add a dependency on this navigator from Maven, add these dependency elements to your pom.xml:
<dependency> <groupId>jaxen</groupId> <artifactId>javabean-navigator</artifactId> <version>2.0.0</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>jaxen</groupId> <artifactId>jaxen-core</artifactId> <version>2.0.0</version> </dependency>
To add a dependency using Gradle:
dependencies { compile 'jaxen:jaxen-core:2.0.0' compile 'jaxen:javabean-navigator:2.0.0' }
